body_html: I would like to use TensorFlow on Windows without Docker, in order to use GPU compute. Using Docker in this case is not using a Windows container, but a Linux virtual machine on Hyper-V or VirtualBox, and so the GPU will not be passed through.

body: I would like to use TensorFlow on Windows without Docker, in order to use GPU compute. Using Docker in this case is not using a Windows container, but a Linux virtual machine on Hyper-V or VirtualBox, and so the GPU will not be passed through.
